import React,{ Component } from "react"; import axios from 'axios'; export default class Blog extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { blog_post : [], blog_box : [] } } static defaultProps = { apiUrl : 'http://localhost/my-app1/' }; componentDidMount = async() =>{ const FormData = require('form-data'); const data = new FormData(); data.append('get_post', true); data.append('post_id', 8); const config = { method: 'post', url: this.props.apiUrl, headers: {}, data : data }; const blog_post = await axios(config); this.setState({ blog_post : blog_post.data }); /** */ const data1 = new FormData(); data1.append('get_posts', 'true'); data1.append('post_type', '8'); const config1 = { method: 'post', url: this.props.apiUrl, headers: {}, data : data1 }; const blog_box = await axios(config1); const makeBox = []; for(let key in blog_box.data.data){ let row = blog_box.data.data[key]; makeBox.push({ id : row.id, title : row.title, featured : row.featured, excerpt : row.excerpt, link : row.link }); this.setState({ blog_box : makeBox }); } } render(){ const {blog_post,blog_box}=this.state; return(

{blog_post.title}

{blog_post.excerpt}

{ blog_box.map(news) } {/*
